files.name: feoc_clause_skeletons.v1.0.json
files.role: Clause skeleton library containing short-form and long-form replacement clause templates

files.name: feoc_consequence_map.v1.0.json
files.role: Maps control-vector hits to consequence classes, UI states, and required actions

files.name: feoc_control_vectors_refactored.v1.0.json
files.role: Authoritative FEOC control vectors with triggers, consequence classes, and statute references

files.name: feoc_global_rules.v1.0.json
files.role: Global precedence, override, and fatality rules applied across all analyses

files.name: feoc_replacement_map.v1.0.json
files.role: Maps consequence outputs to replacement clause skeleton IDs

files.name: feoc_statute_citations_v1.0.json
files.role: Single source of truth for FEOC statutes, regulations, guidance, and canonical URLs

files.name: normalization/feoc_concept_taxonomy.v1.0.json
files.role: Frozen concept taxonomy (concept_id list) used for semantic normalization and mapping across control/consequence vectors

files.name: normalization/feoc_normalization_output_schema.v1.0.json
files.role: Schema for the normalization layer output (normalized concepts + evidence mapping) consumed by downstream analysis

notes:
This manifest is the single authoritative entry point for all frozen v1.0 FEOC inputs.
All analysis must reference only the files listed here.
